short.ar: احصل على درجات عالية من خلال تشغيل طائرك الرقيق عبر الأنابيب في هذه اللعبة المكونة من لاعبين.
short.am: በዚህ ሁለት ተጫዋች ጨዋታ ውስጥ በቧንቧዎች አማካኝነት ፍላፒ ወፍህን በመሮጥ ከፍተኛ ውጤት አግኝ።
short.bg: Получете високи резултати, като стартирате своя flappy птица през тръби в тази две играч игра.
short.bn: এই দুটি প্লেয়ার গেমে পাইপের মাধ্যমে আপনার ফ্ল্যাপি পাখি চালিয়ে উচ্চ স্কোর পান।
short.ca: Obteniu puntuacions altes executant el vostre ocell aletejat a través de canonades en aquest joc de dos jugadors.
short.cs: Získejte vysoké skóre tím, že v této hře pro dva hráče projdete svým chlupatým ptákem potrubím.
short.da: Få høje scorer ved at køre din flappy fugl gennem rør i dette to-spiller spil.
short.de: Holen Sie sich Highscores, indem Sie Ihren flappigen Vogel in diesem Zwei-Spieler-Spiel durch Rohre laufen lassen.
short.el: Λάβετε υψηλές βαθμολογίες τρέχοντας το πουλί σας μέσα από σωλήνες σε αυτό το παιχνίδι δύο παικτών.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Get high scores by running your flappy bird through pipes in this two player game.
short.es: Obtén puntuaciones altas corriendo tu pájaro flappy a través de tuberías en este juego para dos jugadores.
short.et: Hankige selles kahe mängija mängus oma flappy bird läbi torude.
short.fa: گرفتن نمرات بالا با اجرای پرنده flappy خود را از طریق لوله در این بازی دو بازیکن.
short.fi: Saat korkeat pisteet ajamalla flappy-lintusi putkien läpi tässä kahden pelaajan pelissä.
short.fil: Kumuha ng mataas na puntos sa pamamagitan ng pagpapatakbo ng iyong flappy ibon sa pamamagitan ng pip
short.fr: Obtenez des scores élevés en faisant passer votre oiseau flappy à travers des tuyaux dans ce jeu à deux joueurs.
short.gu: આ બે ખેલાડીઓની રમતમાં પાઇપો દ્વારા તમારા ફ્લેપી બર્ડને ચલાવીને ઉચ્ચ સ્કોર્સ મેળવો.
short.he: קבל ציונים גבוהים על ידי הפעלת הציפור המתנפנפת שלך דרך צינורות במשחק זה של שני שחקנים.
short.hi: इस दो खिलाड़ी खेल में पाइप के माध्यम से अपने flappy पक्षी चलाने के द्वारा उच्च स्कोर प्राप्त करें।
short.hr: Dobijte visoke ocjene provlačeći svoju flappy pticu kroz cijevi u ovoj igri s dva igrača.
short.hu: Szerezzen magas pontszámokat, ha a csapkodó madarat csöveken keresztül futtatja ebben a kétjátékos játékban.
short.id: Dapatkan skor tinggi dengan menjalankan burung kepakan Anda melalui pipa dalam permainan dua pemain ini.
short.it: Ottieni punteggi elevati eseguendo il tuo uccello flappy attraverso i tubi in questo gioco per due giocatori.
short.ja: この2プレイヤーゲームでパイプを通してあなたの羽ばたき鳥を走らせることによってハイスコアを得てください。
short.kn: ಈ ಇಬ್ಬರು ಆಟಗಾರರ ಆಟದಲ್ಲಿ ಪೈಪ್ ಗಳ ಮೂಲಕ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಫ್ಲಾಪಿ ಹಕ್ಕಿಯನ್ನು ಓಡಿಸುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನ ಸ್ಕೋರ್ ಗಳನ್ನು ಪಡೆಯಿರಿ.
short.ko: 이 두 플레이어 게임에서 파이프를 통해 푹신한 새를 실행하여 높은 점수를 얻으십시오.
short.lv: Iegūstiet augstus rezultātus, skrienot savam lidojošajam putnam pa caurulēm šajā divu spēlētāju spēlē.
short.ml: ഈ രണ്ട് പ്ലേയർ ഗെയിമിൽ പൈപ്പുകളിലൂടെ നിങ്ങളുടെ ഫ്ലാപ്പി പക്ഷിയെ പ്രവർത്തിപ്പിച്ചുകൊണ്ട് ഉയർന്ന സ്കോറുകൾ നേടുക.
short.mr: या दोन खेळाडूंच्या खेळात पाईपद्वारे आपला फ्लॅपी पक्षी चालवून उच्च गुण मिळवा.
short.ms: Dapatkan skor tinggi dengan menjalankan burung flappy anda melalui paip dalam permainan dua pemain ini.
short.nl: Behaal hoge scores door je flappy vogel door pijpen te laten rennen in dit spel voor twee spelers.
short.no: Få høye score ved å kjøre din flappy fugl gjennom rør i dette to spillerspillet.
short.pl: Zdobądź wysokie wyniki, przepuszczając swojego ptaka przez rury w tej grze dla dwóch graczy.
short.ro: Obține scoruri mari prin rularea pasărea flappy prin conducte în acest joc de doi jucători.
short.ru: Получите высокие баллы, запустив свою хлопкую птицу через трубы в этой игре для двух игроков.
short.sk: Získajte vysoké skóre tým, že v tejto hre pre dvoch hráčov spustíte svojho klapkového vtáka potrubím.
short.sl: Dobili visoke rezultate, ki jih teče vaš flappy ptica skozi cevi v tej igri dveh igralcev.
short.sv: Få höga poäng genom att köra din flappiga fågel genom rör i detta tvåspelarspel.
short.sw: Pata alama za juu kwa kuendesha ndege wako flappy kupitia mabomba katika mchezo huu wa wachezaji wawili.
short.ta: இந்த இரண்டு வீரர் விளையாட்டில் குழாய்கள் மூலம் உங்கள் flappy பறவை இயக்குவதன் மூலம் அதிக மதிப்பெண்கள் பெற.
short.te: ఈ రెండు ఆటగాళ్ళ ఆటలో పైపుల ద్వారా మీ ఫ్లాపీ పక్షిని నడపడం ద్వారా అధిక స్కోర్లను పొందండి.
short.th: รับคะแนนสูงโดยการเรียกใช้นกกระพือปีกของคุณผ่านท่อในเกมผู้เล่นสองคนนี้
short.tr: Bu iki oyunculu oyunda çırpınan kuşunuzu borulardan geçirerek yüksek puanlar alın.
short.uk: Отримайте високі бали, провівши свою хистку птицю по трубах у цій грі для двох гравців.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start avoiding obstacles with a sweet bird. Make your best score and show your skill. King Of Birds is a fun and addictive bird-jumping simulator game. The game's main objective is to reach the highest score by passing through the pipes. Featuring a retro design and stunning 2D graphics, this game can be played in single and two-player modes. You can double the fun by playing with your friend and going on a pleasant journey together in the world of birds. The sound and animations make the game even more impressive and enjoyable.

King Of Birds 2 Player Game has classic game mechanics like Flappy Bird. You have to pass through the pipes by directing the bird character. However, this seemingly simple task can be challenging. You need to think fast, ensure the right timing, and avoid collisions as you pass through the pipes. It tests your reflexes to control your high-speed bird, master challenging tracks and achieve the highest score.

In the game's single-player mode, players try to reach the highest score by pushing their skills. Each success increases the players' desire to improve and motivates them to reach higher goals. In two-player mode, friends challenge each other and enjoy friendly competition. King Of Birds provides a social experience by offering fun moments and enjoyable matches among friends.

The retro design of the game gives players a nostalgic atmosphere and is inspired by the classic games of old times. Colourful 2D graphics reflect the characteristic style of the game while inviting players to an attractive world. The simple and stylish design provides a visually satisfying experience while increasing the gameplay.

King Of Birds, also called Crazy Birds, allows players to have a fun bird-jumping experience. Racing in a world full of birds offers players exciting moments and fun. What are you waiting for to have a pleasant time in the world of these crazy birds?

King Of Birds is an indispensable option for casual games and arcade game lovers. Simple and addictive game mechanics keep players returning and create an enjoyable competitive environment as you try to get higher scores each time.

How To Play
Played with Mouse.

King Of Birds 2 Player Game Features
✓ Little Graphics
✓ 2D Different Mode
✓ Basic control
✓ 2D Environment

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! King Of Birds 2 Player Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
